list.title:
Fireproof
Creates a new Fireproof instance with default storage settings
Most apps should use this and not worry about the details.storage
Fireproof#changesSince
list.description: Returns the changes made to the Fireproof instance since the specified event.

list.title: Fireproof#del
list.description: Deletes a document from the database

list.title: Fireproof#get
list.description: Retrieves the document with the specified ID from the database

list.title: Fireproof#put
list.description: Adds a new document to the database, or updates an existing document. Returns the ID of the document and the new clock head.

list.title: Fireproof#setClock
list.description: Move the current instance to a new point in time. This triggers a notification to all listeners of the Fireproof instance so they can repaint UI, etc.

list.title: Fireproof#snapshot
list.description: Returns a snapshot of the current Fireproof instance as a new instance.

list.title: Fireproof#toJSON
list.description: Renders the Fireproof instance as a JSON object.

list.title: Fireproof.registerListener
list.description: Registers a Listener to be called when the Fireproof instance's clock is updated. Recieves live changes from the database after they are committed.

list.title: Listener
list.description: A Fireproof database Listener allows you to react to events in the database.

list.title: Listener#on
list.description: Subscribe to a topic emitted by the event function.
